Original Title: Little Shop of Horrors
Year: 1986
Length: 94 min.
Country: United States
Directed: Frank Oz
Writer: Howard Ashman
Music: Miles Goodman (Songs:Alan Menken )
Photo: Bob Paynter
Starring: Rick Moranis, Ellen Greene, Steve Martin, Vincent Gardenia, James Belushi, John Candy, Bill Murray , Miriam Margolyes, Christopher Guest
Studio: Warner Bros.
Genre: Musical.Comedy.Terror|Monster.Remake.Horror Comedy.60 years

Synopsis:
---------
Seymour, a young shop assistant in a flower shop, is in love with his partner Audrie, but she is dating a sadistic dentist.One day, just after a strange eclipse, Seymour purchase a small plant, which christens Audrie II.The plant will begin to move and even talk to Seymour, so that it becomes an attraction for the city.What nobody knows is that it is an abominable that feeds on human blood.

Awards:
-------
1986: 2 Nominations for Oscar: Best Original Song, Visual Effects
1987: BAFTA: Nominated for Best Special Visual Effects
